heroSubtitle: Your personal safety companion for exploring South Africa. Get real-time crime statistics and verified safety alerts right on your phone.
getStartedSubtitle: Safety and awareness are just a few taps away.
step1Text: Available for free on both iOS and Android devices.
step2Text: Allow location services for automatic, real-time alerts as you move.
step3Text: Get notified about crime hotspots and incident reports in your area.
featuresSubtitle: TravelHawk equips you with the tools you need to make informed decisions and explore with confidence.
feature1Text: Receive automatic, precinct-based safety alerts as you travel, without having to do a thing.
feature2Text: Stay informed with up-to-the-minute incident reports curated and verified by the TravelHawk team.
feature3Text: Access user-friendly, visualized crime data from all 1,162 police precincts.
feature4Text: Receive timely warnings about roads and areas reported for vehicle spiking and other dangers.
testimonialsSubtitle: Here's what our users are saying about peace of mind on their journeys.
testimonial1Text: "As a solo traveler, TravelHawk was a game-changer. I felt so much more aware of my surroundings and could plan my days with confidence. A must-have app!"
testimonial2Text: "I travel to Johannesburg often for work. This app helps me understand the security landscape of different neighborhoods, which is incredibly valuable."
testimonial3Text: "Even as a local, I've discovered so much about my own city. The incident reports are fantastic for knowing what's happening around me."
missionText: We believe that everyone has the right to feel safe and informed while exploring the beauty of South Africa. TravelHawk was born from a desire to empower travellers and residents with transparent, accessible, and real-time safety information. We're dedicated to building a community that looks out for one another, one alert at a time.
ctaSubtitle: Download TravelHawk today and join a community committed to safer travel.

privacySection1Para1: This Privacy Policy outlines how Skeep Technologies (Pty) Ltd (“we,” “us,” or “our”) collects, uses, discloses, and protects your information when you use the TravelHawk mobile application (“the App”). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled in a safe and responsible manner.
privacySection2Para1: We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our services:
privacySection2Li1: Location Data: With your explicit consent, we access your device’s precise location to provide you with relevant, real-time safety alerts and information for your current area. You can disable location services at any time through your device settings, though this will limit the App's core functionality.
privacySection2Li2: Usage and Analytics Data: We automatically collect anonymized data about how you interact with our App. This may include information such as your device type, operating system, session duration, features used, and crash reports. We use this data to understand user behavior, improve the App's performance and features, and troubleshoot issues.
privacySection3Para1: The information we collect is used for the following purposes:
privacySection3Li1: To operate and maintain the App.
privacySection3Li2: To provide you with location-specific safety alerts and content.
privacySection3Li3: To monitor and analyze usage and trends to improve your experience.
privacySection3Li4: To diagnose and fix technical problems.
privacySection3Li5: To measure the effectiveness of our in-app advertising and marketing campaigns.
privacySection4Para1: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal identification information to others. We may share anonymized, aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers for the purposes outlined above. For example, we may share aggregated data on user engagement in specific regions to improve our service offerings.
privacySection5Para1: We are committed to protecting your information. We adopt appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information and data stored within our App.
privacySection6Para1: By using our App, you consent to our collection and use of information as described in this Privacy Policy. For location-based services, we will request your explicit consent before accessing your device's location data.
